title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 365.6 - COVID-19 Risk Adjustment Pool
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 365.6 - COVID-19 Risk Adjustment Pool

State Regulations

The superintendent shall establish, in the superintendent's sole custody, an account to be called the COVID-19 Risk Adjustment Pool, to receive transfers of funds from insurers subject to the risk adjustment mechanism established by this Part. The moneys so received and deposited in the COVID-19 Risk Adjustment Pool shall not be deemed State funds. The superintendent is authorized to make disbursements without an appropriation from the COVID-19 Risk Adjustment Pool for the purpose of remitting to insurer any moneys due them as a result of the risk adjustment mechanism established by this Part, and such disbursements shall be made pursuant to this Part. comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
